授業目的:
1. Students will obtain some comprehensive knowledge of fundamental and some recent knowledge of cell biology
2. Students will be familiars with the cell structure, cell function, and cell behavior
到達目標: This cell biology could contribute and support their future research or carrier. Furthermore, becoming familiar and more proficient at reading and critiquing references or literature
授業方法: The theories, flowchart, pathway, and video-related biology will be taught via slides of power points. Some of the questions will be given to students in order to evaluate their understanding of this lecture.

第4回: Apoptosis, Necrosis, Mitochondrial dysfunction, and cell death - 1
第5回: Apoptosis, Necrosis, Mitochondrial dysfunction, and cell death 2
第10回: Right-resolution imaging techniques in cell biology
第11回: The structure and deformation of cell membranes
第13回: Cytoskeleton, Stem cell, and iPs cell
第14回: Structure, Functions, and role in wound healing
トピック.授業外学習2: Master students have to prepare by themselves concerning the knowledge of cell biology based on the textbook or international journal that we offer as references. During the class, there will be a temporary discussion in order to evaluate whether the students understand or not.

評価.学位授与の方針との関連Relationship to Diploma Polic:
各授業科目は、各学部・研究科の定めるディプロマ・ポリシー（DP）・カリキュラム・ポリシー（CP）に基づき、カリキュラム上に配置されています。
DP・CPを意識して本授業科目の学修を進めることで、各学部・研究科の期待する能力が養成されます。
各学部・研究科のDP、CPや教育課程表（授業科目一覧等）は、下記リンクこちらに掲載していますので学修計画の参考にしてください。
https://kwic.kwansei.ac.jp/cabinet/reference?typeCd=0&cabinetId=557&directLink=1
※kwicへのリンクとなります（在学生のみ閲覧可）
成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
評価.成績評価Grading3:
備考　Note
The daily performance will be scored for 80% where there will be any questions to students and also their attendance to the lecture (students must attend the lectures at least 90% of total lectures). The report (scored for 20%) will be as mandatory for this evaluation.
